mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_CCCINF (MOTGACLTALCTRCTINFSGMTSEQNO, CCCINFSEQNO, CCC, MOTGACLTALCTRCTINFSEQNO, MOTGACLTALCTRCTINFTYPE, REPORTFLAG) values (#{MotgaCltalCtrctInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CccInfSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Ccc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MotgaCltalCtrctInfSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MotgaCltalCtrctInfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select MOTGACLTALCTRCTINFSGMTSEQNO, CCCINFSEQNO, CCC, MOTGACLTALCTRCTINFSEQNO, MOTGACLTALCTRCTINFTYPE, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_CCCINF
select info1.* from pbcrs_report_cccinf info1 where info1.motgacltalctrctinfseqno=#{MotgaCltalCtrctInfSeqNo}
mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_CCCINFM (MOTGACLTALCTRCTINFSGMTSEQNO, CCCINFSEQNO, CCC, MOTGACLTALCTRCTINFSEQNO, MOTGACLTALCTRCTINFTYPE, REPORTFLAG,etl_date) select MOTGACLTALCTRCTINFSGMTSEQNO, CCCINFSEQNO, CCC, MOTGACLTALCTRCTINFSEQNO, MOTGACLTALCTRCTINFTYPE, '0',to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') from PBCRS_REPORT_CCCINF where MOTGACLTALCTRCTINFSGMTSEQNO = #{MotgaCltalCtrctInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
